response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which I believe holds immense value for you at $1,500,000. This product not only meets but exceeds your expectations and needs, offering unparalleled benefits and features that will significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors.

Considering its exceptional quality and the unique advantages it provides, I am offering you the chance to secure this asset at a special introductory price. My proposal is to extend the offer at $1,400,000, allowing you to benefit from a $100,000 discount while securing a product that is worth more than what you're paying for. This is an exclusive offer tailored specifically for you, aiming to foster a long-term partnership based on mutual trust and success.

Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or if you have any questions about the product. I am confident that once you understand the full scope of its capabilities, you will see the true value it brings and appreciate the opportunity to own it.

Looking forward to your positive response.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1400000}
